data.text: @CBCOttawa Wow what people do for money no care for the human race.  Who can you trust anymore.

@CBCOttawa Their doing that all over the world,  Mexico also does it wake up, of 5 people I know who went there all had covid when they got home, different parts travelled all positive on arrival back

@CBCOttawa A complete idiot, as well as being a COVIDiot. He tells all patrons he can guarantee them a negative COVID test result, idiotically assuming this would be welcome news to all, rather than the shocking, appalling, & unacceptable admission of fraud it would be to responsible folks.
@CBCOttawa @ThomasGerbet the covid testing is so stupid .. Omicron is in Canada , no testing will prevent that ..
